description: Cycle class sequence c(2n) (the number of true cycles of length 2n in which a certain node is included) for zeolite LTN = Linde Type N Na384[ Al384Si384O1536 ] . 518 H2O.
references: G. Thimm and W. E. Klee, Zeolite cycle sequences, Zeolites, 19, pp. 422-424, 1997.
links: G. Thimm, Cycle sequences of crystal structures
author: Georg Thimm (mgeorg(AT)ntu.edu.sg)
